title: When will tree limbs and leaf litter from Hurricane Irene be picked up? It\'s been two weeks.
text:
If
you live in the unincorporated areas of New Hanover County, here's a
link that will answer your question:
http://www.nhcgov.com/News/Pages/DisasterAssistance.aspx



Wilmington will pick up debris separately:
http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/Home/News/tabid/429/ItemID/627/View/Details/Default.aspx
